product_name: Terry Stretch Mini Floral Chatter Bike Skirt - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Terry Stretch Mini Floral Chatter Bike Skirt is the perfect cover-up and travel companion. Simple, pull-on styling goes riding or dining in seconds. Slip it on over your bike shorts for cute coverage; polyester/lycra blend packs small enough to stow in a jersey pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Terry Stretch Mini Floral Chatter Bike Skirt is the perfect cover-up and travel companion. Simple, pull-on styling goes riding or dining in seconds.
